request.description:
The type of object (scan or policy).  
The unique id of the object.

request.description: Pass 1 enable the link. Pass 0 to disable.

Generate API key for logged in user

request.description: Links the local scanner to a Nessus Manager. Unlink the scanner by setting 'linked_to' to 'null'.
